profile.name: Dikshya Sharma
profile.summary: Innovative, tech-savvy undergraduate with strong problem-solving skills. Known for leadership, collaboration, and excellent communication, committed to using technical expertise to create impactful solutions in dynamic environments.

experience.title: Apprentice Garage | Solution Developer

Engaged in workshops on Agile Methodology and Cloud Server Management, showcasing teamwork, communication, and a proactive approach to learning and professional development.
